snippet: A jury awarded the casino mogul Steve Wynn $20 million in his slander case against Joe Francis, founder of “Girls Gone Wild,” who claimed Mr. Wynn threatened to kill him over a gambling debt.
abstract: Jury awards casino mogul Steve Wynn $20 million in his slander case against Joe Francis, founder of entertainment brand Girls Gone Wild, who claimed Wynn threatened to kill him over a gambling debt.
lead_paragraph: A jury awarded the casino mogul Steve Wynn $20 million in his slander case against Joe Francis, founder of “Girls Gone Wild,” who claimed Mr. Wynn threatened to kill him over a gambling debt.

headline.main: California: Casino Mogul Wins Slander Suit
headline.print_headline: California: Casino Mogul Wins Slander Suit
